Help.Category:
Use [H] key to open the Basic control guide window.



[Character Movement]
[W] : Forward
[S] : Backward
[A] : Left
[D] : Right
[E] : Auto Run
[Space] : Jump
[Mouse Movement] : Change view (visual angle)

[Switch to battle mode]
Use [Tab] to toggle between battle / non-battle mode.

[Combat Method]
[Left Mouse Button] : Basic Attack
[Right Mouse Button] : Special Attack
[Number Key 1~0] : Use skill / item in quick slot
[~] : Toggle between quick slot bars

[R] : Revive / Party Revive
[F] : Pick up loot
[Alt] : Show / Hide item name

[Toggle Front Sight / Cursor]
Use [Ctrl] to switch your mouse control from frontal view to cursor mode. When in cursor mode, you are unable to change the angle of frontal view. As such, this is not recommended to use during battle.

[Change Visual Angle]
Change visual angle via [Mouse Movement].
Use [Mouse Wheel] to zoom in / out.

[Enter chat]
Use [Enter] key
to enter text in the chat window.

[Chat Window Command]
[/s] [/1] [Ctrl+1] : General Chat
[/p] [/2] [Ctrl+2] : Party Chat
[/g] [/3] [Ctrl+3] : Guild Chat
[/w] [/4] [Ctrl+4] : Private Chat

[Reply to Private Message]
Use [T] key to reply to the last person who had private messaged you.

[Gesture]
Use [I] to open your backpack and select the [Gesture] tab. Drag the [Gesture] tab to the quick slot to use.

[Instanced Dungeon]
1. You'll enter the [World Region] once you leave the village
2. [World Region] has many [Portal]. To enter, simply move towards the portal.
3. Each [Portal] has preset level restrictions. Portals that appear black mean the minimum character level requirements have not been met. As such, you will not be able to enter.
4. If you are in a party of 2 or more, all members need to be at the entrance of the portal in order to enter.

[Using Skills]
1. First, use the [K] to open the character skill window.
2. Click on the skill to be used and
drag it into the quick slot.
3. Skills in the quick slot can be activated by using [Number keys 0-9].

[Open Window]
[P] : Character Information
[I] : Inventory Backpack
[K] : Skill Window
[O] : Community Window
[U] : Quest Window
[M] : Map
[L] : Achievement Window
[Q] : PvP Combat Information
[H] : Keyboard & Mouse Guide
[ESC] : System Menu

[Interface Adjusttment]
[ + ] : Zoom in mini map
[ - ] : Zoom out mini map
[ ] ] : Increase mouse sensitivity
[ [ ] : Decrease mouse sensitivity

[Voice Message]
At the system menu [ESC] - Game Setting - Macro Commands
to confirm message.
[F1] : Request Healing
[F2] : Attack
[F3] : Follow
[F4] : Retreat
[F5] : Stop
[F6] : Request Assistance
[F7] : Chat Macro 1
[F8] : Chat Macro 2
[F9] : Chat Macro 3
[F10] : Chat Macro 4

[Other Hotkeys]
[Print Screen] : Take a screenshot
[Scroll Lock] : Record a video

[Creating Party]
Use [O] to open the Community window.
Select [Party] tab and
click on [Create Party]to create a party. You may also right-click on a player to invite him/her to join the party.

[Joining Party]
Select from the Friends window on [Party] to see the available party list. Choose the party to join and click on [Join]button to enter party. You may also click on 'Accept' to join the party upon invitation.

[Item Distribution]
If you are the party leader
you can access the [Item Distribution Rule] and [Random Distribution Rule] menu to change the distribution rules.

[Random Distribution Rule] : You may set it from 'Grade D' to 'Grade S'. If the party gets the item of the defined grade,the item will be given to a random party member.
[Basic Distribution Rule] : If the item gained is below the grade as set in the Random Distribution Rule, you may choose to set the rule to 'distribute in order' or 'given to the character who picked up the item' or 'give to the leader'.
However, if the item gained is untradeable, it will be distributed according to the dice result regardless of the distribution rules.

[Combat Tips]
[Bounce Combo]
You may chain the combo by striking the monster after it has rebounded from a wall or obstacle.

[Party Combo]
You may chain the combo by striking the monster after it has been striked by your party member.

[Special Attack]
Use the right mouse button to execute special attack (kick).
Try the special attack on monsters who are lying on the ground.
